text: Northbound 1/2/3 trains are running with delays after EMS assisted someone in need and we removed a train from service at 59 St-Columbus Circle.

2 3  trains are running with delays in both directions after EMS assisted someone in need on a train at Park Place.

Southbound 2/3 trains have resumed making regular scheduled stops.

Northbound F and Court Sq-bound G trains are running express from Church Av to Smith-9 Sts.

We are investigating why a train's brakes activated at Church Av.

For service to/from bypassed stops, take a southbound train.

2 3 4/5 trains are running with delays in both directions after EMS assisted someone in need on a train at Park Place.

Southbound 2/3 trains have resumed making regular scheduled stops.

Southbound 1 trains are running with delays after we removed a train with a door problem from service at 207 St.

Southbound 1 trains have resumed making regular stops from 215 St to Dyckman St.

Southbound 1 trains are running express from 215 St to Dyckman St.

What's Happening?

We're removing a train with a door problem from service at 207 St. 

For service to/from bypassed stations, take a northbound train.

Southbound 4 trains are running with delays after EMS assisted someone in need on a train at Burnside Av.

Southbound 4 trains have resumed making regular stops from Bedford Park Blvd-Lehman College to Burnside Av.

Southbound 4 trains are running express from Bedford Park Blvd-Lehman College to Burnside Av.

What's Happening?

We've requested EMS assistance for someone in need on a train at Burnside Av. 

For service to/from bypassed stations, take a northbound train.

A/C trains are running with delays in both directions while we address a signal problem near Fulton St.

Some southbound C trains are running on the F from W 4 St-Wash Sq to Jay St-MetroTech. 
Listen for announcements to hear how your train will operate.

4/5/6 trains are running with delays in both directions after we restored third rail power  between 125 St and Longwood Av

Southbound 5 trains have resumed making scheduled stops.
